text: Epipsestis niveifasciata is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It is found in Vietnam., 2000: New Epipsestis Matsumura, 1921 species (Lepidoptera, Thyatiridae) from Vietnam and from Nepal. Acta Zoologica Academiae Scientiarum Hungaricae 46(4): 337–349. ==References== Category:Moths described in 2000 Category:Thyatirinae
title: Epipsestis niveifasciata
